text: El Carmen de Bolívar Airport is an airport serving the town of El Carmen de Bolívar, in the Bolívar Department of Colombia. The airport is south of the town. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - El Carmen de Bolívar *OurAirports - El Carmen de Bolívar *FallingRain - El Carmen de Bolívar * Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: El Carmen de Bolívar Airport
